    U

    update() - Method in class game.core.GameView
    Updates the game logic associated with the view, primarily delegated to the player controller.
    update() - Method in class game.core.PlayerController
    Updates the player's movement on each frame.
    updateAnimation() - Method in class game.entities.Enemy
    Updates the currently displayed animation frame.
    updateAnimation() - Method in class game.entities.FlyingEnemy
    Overrides updateAnimation to prevent the timer in the superclass from changing the .gif image.
    updateAnimation(Vec2) - Method in class game.entities.Player
    Updates the player's animation based on their current velocity.
    updateHighScores(long) - Static method in class game.util.HighScoreManager
    Updates the list of top three times if the new time qualifies.
    updateView() - Method in class game.util.PolygonEditor
    Update the display and print the current coordinate list to console.
